sentences.en: But locals with long memories thought this was fair revenge for the injustice of 1961.
sentences.cn: 可是，对以前的事记忆犹新的当地人却认为，这是对1961年那起非正义事件的正当复仇。

sentences.en: He will wish to revenge his humiliation in last Season's Final.
sentences.cn: 他会为在上个季度的决赛中所受的耻辱而报复的.

sentences.en: His heart burned with longing for revenge.
sentences.cn: 他心中燃烧着急欲复仇的怒火.

sentences.en: Jack was hurt deeply, and he bided his time for revenge.
sentences.cn: 杰克受了很深的伤害, 他等待着报仇的时机.

sentences.en: People should understand how thirsty for revenge they are.
sentences.cn: 人们应该理解他们复仇的愿望是多么强烈。

sentences.en: Revenge leads to a self-perpetuating cycle of violence.
sentences.cn: 怨怨相报会导致永不休止的暴力。

sentences.en: Revenge may recoil upon the person who takes it.
She poisoned his mind with ideas of hate and revenge.
sentences.cn: 她用复仇的思想来毒害他的心灵.

sentences.en: She took revenge on her ex-boyfriend by smashing up his home.
sentences.cn: 为了报复，她砸了前任男友的家。

sentences.en: That old man's revenge has been blacker than my sin.
sentences.cn: 那老人的复仇比我的罪过更见不得人.

sentences.en: The attack was in revenge for the deaths of two loyalist prisoners.
sentences.cn: 这次袭击是对处死两个被囚禁的忠诚分子的报复.

sentences.en: The attackers were said to be taking revenge on the 14-year-old, claiming he was a school bully.
sentences.cn: 据说，这些攻击者是在报复这个14岁的孩子，说他是学校的小霸王。

sentences.en: The paper accused her of trying to revenge herself on her former lover.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸指责她企图报复她以前的情人。

sentences.en: The poor murdered girl must be revenged.
sentences.cn: 一定要为被害的可怜女孩报仇。

sentences.en: There was anger in his eyes and revenge in his heart.
sentences.cn: 他两眼闪现怒火,一心只想复仇.

sentences.en: They've had their revenge more or less.

words.tran_cn: 深藏仇恨的；燃起复仇念头的

phrases.tran_cn: 向某人报仇[亦作revenge oneself on someone]

phrases.phrase: revenge is a dish best served (或 eaten) cold

trans.tran_en: something you do in order to punish someone who has harmed or offended you
to punish someone who has done something to harm you or someone else
